name: Fovos VR
description: Fovos is a post-apocalyptic horror, rail shooter for the HTC Vive, set in a future where an omnipotent AI is taking over human brains through genetic implants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel i5 4650 / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 960/AMD 390 or equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space
